/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC    -D'htonll(x)=((1==htonl(1))?(x):((uint64_t)htonl((x)&0xFFFFFFFF)<<32)|htonl((x)>>32))' -D'ntohll(x)=((1==ntohl(1))?(x):((uint64_t)ntohl((x)&0xFFFFFFFF)<<32)|ntohl((x)>>32))' -D'htonll(x)=((1==htonl(1))?(x):((uint64_t)htonl((x)&0xFFFFFFFF)<<32)|htonl((x)>>32))' -D'ntohll(x)=((1==ntohl(1))?(x):((uint64_t)ntohl((x)&0xFFFFFFFF)<<32)|ntohl((x)>>32))' -std=c++11  -shared -Wl,-soname,libplog.so -o ../../../lib/libplog.so
